title: Cowboy-style pork and beans
directions: Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the onions and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add the red pepper and garlic and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add the pork and cook for 3-4 minutes until browned.
Add the chopped tomatoes, puree, molasses, paprika and chilli, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in the beans, simmer for another 5 minutes then serve
ingredients: 400g pork fillet, visible fat removed and chopped into small chunks
2 x 400g tin cannellini beans, drained weight approx 470g
